entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
